Texts.Chs: 把^orange;肥料^reset;带给我。（位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;）
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Fertilizer^reset; to me at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Now you can create some more advanced chemicals, and grow even better crops! Upgrade your ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset; into a ^orange;Chemistry Lab^reset; as soon as you are able.

^orange;Fertilizer^reset; is essential to produce plants of any real value. To make some, you will first need an ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset;. I need 1 barrel of ^orange;Fertilizer^reset; for this project. Bring me some, would you?
